products.title: Splash Scarlet Red Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash scarlet red electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The bold red roller is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm saturated shade. Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space, and are cordless and therefore child-safe by design.

products.title: Bermuda Plain Raspberry Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Available in a range of sunny colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. Bermuda is also available in their panel and vertical ranges. This pink roller blind is perfect to create a cosy feel in your home and will add a splash of colour to the room of your choice. The electric aspect of this blind means it is easy to use and perfect for those difficult to reach windows. Product id: db-erbx0477 fabric colour: raspberry material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes bermuda plain raspberry electric roller blind in pink.

products.title: Bella Blackout Scarlet Red Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home. This bold red electric roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Bella Blackout Ruby Red Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This firey ruby red electric roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Bella Blackout Chilli Red Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style both inside and outside your home. This chill red electric roller blind works with any room and is also made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure electirc roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Musa Chilli Red Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Rich red trees on a soft, neutral background makes the musa chilli electric roller blind really pop. This simple yet impactful design is printed on quality fabric with an electric control mechanism to adjust the blind with ease, wherever your window is positioned. This stylish blind is a practical option for a contemporary living space. Product id: db-erbx2023 fabric colour: chilli red material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes musa chilli red electric roller blind in red.
